structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Responsibilities of master contractor working for company.

text.section: No firm, company, or corporation may engage in the practice of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning contracting in any county of the Commonwealth, unless the person in responsible charge of the heating, ventilation, and air conditioning work is a master heating, ventilation, and air conditioning contractor and is an employee or subcontractor of the firm, company, or corporation.

Each master heating, ventilation, and air conditioning contractor who is employed by a firm, company, or corporation engaged in the practice of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning contracting shall notify the board of that employment and upon termination of the employment.
No master heating, ventilation, and air conditioning contractor shall represent more than one (1) firm, company, or corporation.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1994.
